text: Giuseppe Rotunno (19 March 1923 â€“ 7 February 2021) was an Italian cinematographer. He won a BAFTA Award in 1979 for his work in All That Jazz. Rotunno was born in Rome. His career lasted from 1955 to 1997. Rotunno was the first non-American member admitted to the American Society of Cinematographers in 1966.
